did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Chicago Laryngological and Ontological Society. Records

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Records of the regular monthly and annual meetings of the Chicago Laryngological and Ontological Society.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Chicago Laryngological and Ontological Society. Records, Crerar Ms 69, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph and typescript records of the regular monthly and annual meetings of the C.L.O.S. Volume One: Holograph minutes on ruled paper, and typed carbon copies, 1899-1915. All materials tipped, pasted, and pinned in. Volume Two: Typescript transcription of minutes in Volume 1, 1899-1915. Volume Three: Typescript and carbon copies of minutes, 1916-1921. Includes typescript correspondence, with a typed copy of address to the committee by G.W. Boot, M.D., tipped and folded in. Volume Four: Typescript minutes, 1922-1938. Volume Five: Typescript minutes, 1939-1951. (The Society was called Chicago Laryngological and Climatological Association before 1906.) Volumes I-IV bound in maroon buckram; Volume V bound in cardboard binder.
